text: Emmanuel Ocran (born February 19, 1996) is a Ghanaian footballer currently playing for Ghana Premier League side Dreams FC. ==Professional career== Emmanuel Ocran was part of the Wa All Stars team that won the 2015-16 Ghana Premier League. On 15 February 2017, Ocran joined United Soccer League side Real Monarchs on loan from All Stars and is currently playing for Dreams FC.https://www.rsl.com/post/2017/02/15/real-monarchs-sign-michael-gallagher- and-emmanuel-ocranhttps://www.ocsportsnews.com/premier- league/2018-02-28-emmanuel-ocran-signed-a-year-deal-with-karela-united-fc ==Honours== Ghana Premier League Winners -2016 Ghana Super Cup Winners Kuntu Blankson's Player of the Season -2015/2016 ==International== Ocran was called up to the Ghana national team in August 2016 for their 2017 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.http://ghanasoccernet.com/wa-all-stars-talented-striker- emmanuel-ocran-earns-late-black-stars-call-up-ahead-of-rwanda-afcon- qualifierhttp://www.sportscrusader.com/emmanuel-ocran-credits-team-mates-for- black-stars-call-up/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Real Monarchs players Category:Dreams F.C.
